mapper.select: SELECT ,COUNT(*) AS count FROM sb_category a LEFT JOIN sb_category_attr b ON a.id = b.category_id WHERE a.id = #{categoryId}
SELECT name_,id FROM sb_category WHERE del_flag = 0 AND unuseful = 0 AND id IN( SELECT DISTINCT parent_id FROM sb_company_category WHERE company_id = #{param1} AND del_flag = 0) AND title = #{param2}
SELECT sc.name_,sc.id FROM sb_category sc WHERE sc.parent_id = #{param1}
SELECT sc.name_, sc.id, scc.price, sc.unit FROM sb_category sc LEFT JOIN sb_company_category scc ON scc.category_id = sc.id WHERE scc.`parent_id` = #{param1} AND scc.`company_id` = #{param2}

SELECT scc.* FROM sb_category scc INNER JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT parent_id FROM sb_company_recycler scr LEFT JOIN sb_company_category scc ON scr.company_id = scc.company_id WHERE scr.recycler_id = #{recId} AND FORMAT(scc.price, 2) > 0 ) notNull ON notNull.parent_id = scc.id WHERE scc.title = #{title} AND scc.level_ = #{level} AND scc.del_flag =0 UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT a.* FROM sb_category a LEFT JOIN sb_category b ON a.id = b.parent_id WHERE a.level_ = #{level} AND a.title = #{title} AND b.unuseful = '1' AND b.del_flag =0
SELECT DISTINCT a.* FROM sb_category a LEFT JOIN sb_category b ON a.id = b.parent_id WHERE a.level_ = #{level} AND a.title = #{title} AND b.unuseful = '1' AND a.del_flag =0

SELECT a.title FROM ( SELECT a.title, b.b.category_id FROM sb_category a INNER JOIN ( SELECT a.category_id FROM sb_company_category a WHERE a.company_id = #{companyId} ) b ON a.id = b.category_id WHERE a.level_ = 1 ) a GROUP BY a.title

SELECT IF(c.price is NULL,IF(b.price is NULL,a.market_price,b.price),c.price) AS price FROM sb_category a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM sb_category_city WHERE city_id = #{cityId} AND category_id = #{categoryId} ) b ON a.id = b.category_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM sb_company_category_city WHERE company_id = #{companyId} AND city_id = #{cityId} AND category_id = #{categoryId} ) c ON a.id = c.category_id WHERE a.id = #{categoryId}
SELECT FALSE AS banned, a.id , a.name_ AS name, 'TEXT' AS type FROM sb_category a WHERE a.level_ = 0 AND a.title = 2 AND a.name_ != '废玻璃'
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM sb_company_category a INNER JOIN sb_category b ON a.category_id = b.id WHERE a.company_id = #{companyId} AND b.title = #{title}
